title: 装了口袋妖怪mod打开就错误了= =
author: higifi
txt_content:
modloader audiomod 都装了，。是置顶帖的。版本Beta 1.81  META-INF 也删除了。玩这么久的mod就这里出现了问题= =坑爹
以下是错误代码

replies.author: higifi
replies.txt_content:
口袋妖怪mod http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... cial-pokemobs-v047/

1.81的啊= =没错啊。怎么回事，，

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
請看清楚安裝說明... 
Requires ModLoader, AudioMod, and ModLoaderMP
以上三個MOD都要裝上...
